advancedOptionsDesc.message: You can manually update the local database of blocked websites, update the config of Censor Tracker and manage other advanced options.

appDesc.message: A censorship circumvention extension. Stay safe online with our proxy extension.

appName.message: Censor Tracker – Proxy for Privacy & Security

areYouSureYouWantToResetSettingsDesc.message: Regenerate the PAC file for your current region and reset the settings.

areYouSureYouWantToResetSettingsTitle.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?

backendIsIntermittentDesc.message: Try to reset the settings to defaults or contact us via Telegram.

backendIsIntermittentPopupMessage.message: There was a problem getting the extension configuration →

backendIsIntermittentTitle.message: There was a problem getting the extension configuration.

blockedDesc.message: This website is either blocked or added to your custom proxying list, so Censor Tracker provides you access to it through a reliable proxy.

chooseFileOnComputer.message: Choose a file on your computer

controlledByOtherExtensionTitle.message:
Another extension «
$name$
» is controlling your proxy settings.

controlledByOtherExtensions.message: Other extensions are controlling your proxy.

controlledByOtherExtensionsDesc.message: To use Censor Tracker, disable the following extensions in browser settings:

controlledByOtherExtensionsMessage.message: Another extension controls the proxy. More details →

cooperationAcceptedMessage.message: $hostname$ may share your data with third parties.

disseminatorCoopRefused.message: This service claimed that they do not transmit personal data to third parties.

disseminatorDesc.message: This service may transfer your personal data (including messages and all traffic) to government authorities.

disseminatorTitle.message: This service may transmit your data to government authorities.

emptyFileError.message: The file is empty or damaged. Please check it and try again.

extensionInstalledDesc.message: Pin the Censor Tracker in the browser panel in two clicks to be always aware of websites that may transmit your personal data to third parties.

fetchURLError.message: The URL you entered is not available. Please check it and try again.

fileSizeError.message: File size should not exceed 64 KB

ignoredSitesDesc.message: Hosts that will always be ignored by Censor Tracker. If there is a problem while opening the website, this list may help. Each host starts with a new line.

incognitoAccessRequiredDescription.message: To open $hostname$ through a proxy in Firefox, you need permission to work in Private Windows. Otherwise, our proxy will not work.

incognitoAccessRequiredTitle.message: The website is unavailable or blocked. Allow Censor Tracker incognito access to open such websites.

installedAllowIncognitoDescription.message: This permission is required for Censor Tracker to open blocked websites for you through a proxy. Unfortunately, there is no other way for Firefox.

installedAllowIncognitoDescriptionThen.message: After that, open the Censor Tracker's popup and confirm the permissions are granted.

installedAllowIncognitoTitle.message: Allow Censor Tracker to work in Private Mode.

invalidURLError.message: The URL you entered is invalid. Please check it and try again.

maxDomainsExceededError.message: The maximum number of domains that can be added is 1000. Please shorten the list and try again.

notBlockedDesc.message: If access to the website is blocked, Censor Tracker will offer to load it through a reliable proxy.

notDisseminatorDesc.message: Some websites may transmit your personal data to government authorities, but we have no such information about this website.

notDisseminatorTitle.message: Information about data transmission was not found.

optionsConfirmResetMessage.message: All your settings will be removed. Are you sure you want to do this?

optionsIgnoredWebsitesDesc.message: For these addresses proxy will always be disabled. If there are problems with opening certain websites, this list may help.

optionsLoadFromSource.message: Load from a file or URL

optionsProxiedWebsitesEditorDesc.message: You can manually manage the list of domains that will be proxied by the extension.

optionsProxyDesc.message: If a website is blocked, Censor Tracker will bypass restrictions to give you access to it. Disable this setting if you use another service to bypass censorship (for example, a VPN) to increase connection speed.

optionsRegistryDesc.message: Censor Tracker tracks a registries of blocked websites and automatically opens such sites, bypassing censorship.

optionsRegistryIsEmptyDesc.message: There is nothing to proxy for your current region right now, since the registry of blocked websites is empty, please, either manually update the local database, or add websites to the «Proxying List».

optionsRegistryIsEmptyTitle.message: A registry is empty: nothing to proxy.

overlayNetworkDesc.message: Censor Tracker allows you to open websites through overlaid networks

popupDesc.message: In plain text format. Each domain on a new line.

popupLoadFromSourceTitle.message: Load a list of sites that will always open through a proxy

privateBrowsingPermissionsRequiredMessag.message: Proxy disabled. Private Windows browsing permissions required →

privateBrowsingRequired.message: Allow the extension to work in private windows.

privateBrowsingRequiredDesc.message: So that we could open blocked websites for you through our proxy. There is no another way to make proxy work in Firefox.

proxiedWebsitesEditorPageDesc.message: You can manually add up to 1000 domains that will be proxied by the extension.

proxyConnectionIssuesMessage.message: A network problem has been detected. Please go to our support chat and tell us about the problem, we will try to solve it →

proxyOptionsStatusDesc.message: You can disable proxying or switch to your own proxy.

proxyOptionsStatusTitle.message: The proxy is working intermittently right now.

registrySelectRegionDesc.message: You can select a region to circumvent country-specific censorship. Selecting particular country also disables auto-detection of your country (based on GeoIP)  which is helpful if you're using software which changes your real IP (for instance VPN).

registryTypeComplete.message: Use a complete registry of blocked domains (400k+ domains)

registryTypeLightweight.message: Use lightweight registry of blocked domains (100k+ domains)

resetToDefaultDesc.message: Reset all settings to default and generate PAC file for your current region. Use this option if there are availability problems with blocked websites.

shareFeedback.message: Got issues or suggestions? Let us know!

showDebugInfoDesc.message: Show debug information of the extension.

showNotificationsDesc.message: We will warn you when you visit a service that transmits your messages, personal data, and all traffic to third parties automatically.

siteActionAlwaysDesc.message: Always open this website through a proxy

siteActionAutoDesc.message: Open the site through a proxy only if the site is unavailable due to blocking.

siteActionNeverDesc.message: Never open this website through a proxy (even if the site is unavailable due to blocking)

siteActionTitle.message: How should a proxy be used to for this website?

updateAvailableDesc.message: New version of Censor Tracker is available. Please update the extension.

updateLocalRegistryDesc.message: Update the local database of the blocked websites for your region.

updateLocalRegistryTitle.message: Force update the extension's local database

updateTakesTime.message: Database update will take some time.

useProxyDesc.message: If a website is blocked, Censor Tracker will bypass restrictions to give you access to it. Disable this setting if you use another service to bypass censorship (for example, a VPN) to increase connection speed.

useRegistryDesc.message: We maintain registries of blocked sites in order to provide access to them through a proxy. If this option is disabled, then only sites from your list of «Proxying List» will be proxied.

exportSettingsDesc.message: You can export your settings to a JSON file and import them later.

importSettingsDesc.message: You can import your settings from a JSON file.
